duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently conduct expert investigations and handle complex fraud referrals.
Review complex CI & SIU investigations independently.
Develop and document information on any investigation, file review, or audit.
Offer expert advice to clients regarding SIU investigations.
Conduct CEU level courses and Fraud Awareness training for clients and others.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in criminal justice or related field and 4 years demonstrated experience conducting complex insurance investigations or adjusting complex claims.
